alert.note: Alert for Paulding; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:35AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Blackford, Adams, southeastern Wells, Jay, south central Paulding and Van Wert Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 235 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Bluffton to near Portland to 8 miles southeast of Muncie. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Van Wert, Bluffton, Decatur, Portland, Berne, Dunkirk, Montpelier, Redkey, Geneva, Convoy, Monroe, Ohio City, Pennville, Westchester, Center, Middlebury, Preble, Nottingham, Dixon and Willshire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
